entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 2.
